segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, seemingly engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense that she doesn't even notice the water splashing over the edges.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical, really, how unaware she is of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I canâ€™t help but think about the potential disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water could ruin those lovely cabinets that have probably seen many dinners.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yet, the garden outside looks so peaceful, a stark contrast to the madness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she would react differently if she could see the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
